page.title: 11THE MAIN STREET
page.content: The Main street-old and new- crowd together in Kilwinning.A visitor leaving the station will cross the busy Dalry Road and will see the Caley Centre once a station for another railway company now a hostel(1984) and Kilwinning Academy.(1977).The Townshouse where the the coucil met before Strathclyde Region took over and then pass the mini-roundabout (1979),the modern shopping complex that has been pedestrianised,the post office ,the Abbey Church and ruins,the Masonic Lodge 0,the fine Mercat Cross-one of the oldest in Scotland and a spinning factory at the end of the road.
